articles.author: Mrigakshi Dixit
articles.title: NASA shuts Voyager 2 plasma instrument from 12 billion miles away - Interesting Engineering
articles.description: The Plasma Spectrometer (PLS) has been the eyes and ears of Voyager 2, measuring the charged particles that shape our solar system and beyond.
articles.content: When Voyager 2 left the heliosphere, the solar wind flow to the three cups facing the Sun decreased a lot. The fourth cup’s (used to study planetary magnetospheres) best data is only collected every … [+851 chars]
